name: Modular Healing Fountain & Crypt
description: I love making crafts for tabletop gaming modular.  Let's face it, they can take quite a bit of time to complete, so why make them for only one use.  With this build complete you'll have a healing fountain, crypt, mausoleum, and/or shrine to add to your collection!  Grab the plans and follow along with my video tutorial on YouTube at Tabletop WitchCRAFT.
